title: One Hour Sports Injury Treatment With Consultation and Assessment for £16 at East Devon Sports Therapy (Value £40)
highlights:

title: Swedish Massage and Full Manicure for £19 at Verve Hairdressing (£56 Value)

title: One Hour Hot Air Balloon Flight for Two with Champagne for £139 at Ballooning In The Cotswolds (£370 Value)
highlights:
• Chance to inflate the balloon, champagne on landing and signed certificate
  • Eight launch sights: The Cotswolds, Cirencester, Bourton on the Water, Stroud, Cotswold Water Park, Cheltenham, Tetbury and Gloucester
  • Three to four hour experience with one hour flight
  • Welcome pack sent upon booking
  • Retrieval crew drives guests back to base after flight
  • Professional in flight photo to take away

title: Four Night Weekday orThree Night Weekend Break in Eight Berth Family Static Caravan for £175 atJuliot’s Well Holiday Park (Up to £506 Value)
highlights:
• Choice of 4 nights Mon-Fri or 3 nights Fri-Mon
  • Cornish breakfast on first morning
  • Outdoor heated pool
  • Fishing lake
  • Licensed bar and restaurant
